thread.section_title: Hotel Mela - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Soup and a beer on a cold day
thread.title_full: Soup and a beer on a cold day - Review of Hotel Mela, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gymlady30
title: Soup and a beer on a cold day
text:
Stopped in for a quick bite to eat and a cocktail. I'm not a big beer drinker but man do I love Kentucky bourbon barrel beer. And yes they had it !! Was I happy and surprised not many places in the north carry it! My husband ordered his usual Bloody Mary and complimented it.
Our cup of soup was a special on the menu. Corned beef and carrots soup . Delicious flavor , loaded w meat and carrots . Great use of leftovers that I will use at home next year . Best pit stop in a long time . We viewed other dishes being served generous portions !
